name: Or Brener
label: Software Engineer
summary: Full Stack Software Developer and Business Systems Analyst with a diverse skill set in backend development, cloud integration, and team collaboration.

work_experience.summary: Contributed to cloud-based system development by building scalable backend services, optimizing integrations, and improving operational efficiency across teams.
highlights: Engineered scalable GCP Cloud Tasks Client and message router to coordinate inter-service communication, reducing processing time by 30% and significantly improving uptime across core integrations.
Optimized the Shopify-Salesforce integration by rerouting data flow through GCP, cutting sync issues by 30% and improving data accuracy across 5+ interconnected systems.
Migrated legacy GCP cloud functions into containerized Docker services, simplifying deployment pipelines and improving integration scalability and resilience in production environments.

work_experience.summary: Supported global infrastructure improvements by optimizing internal tools, automating workflows, and enhancing data accessibility through dashboard migration and API integration.
highlights: Spearheaded the migration of 10+ analytics dashboards from Tableau to Power BI, cutting load times by 60% and significantly improving reporting access for internal teams.
Built and integrated a custom ServiceNow API into TD's device lookup tool, automating hardware queries and reducing manual request volume by 40% across five departments.
Partnered with the Network Infrastructure team to evaluate device performance in 30+ global offices, standardizing workflows and boosting support response reliability.

work_experience.summary: Modernized backend systems for Telus Billing by refactoring legacy code, improving data flows, and ensuring stable deployments through QA and impact assessments.
highlights: Coordinated closely with business stakeholders and senior engineers to design and deliver accurate, production-grade billing data flows. Delivered reliable, well-documented billing feeds, improving data accuracy and reporting efficiency.

Modernized TELUS' billing infrastructure by migrating legacy C-based components to Kotlin, delivering new GCP-integrated billing feeds and reducing technical debt by 30% while improving maintainability and system performance.
Led QA testing and impact assessments for backend service changes, helping ensure system stability and significantly reducing bugs in post-release environments.

work_experience.summary: Migrated mobile features to web using JavaScript, collaborated on feature planning, and ensured quality through testing and QA for improved product stability.
highlights: Migrated key mobile features to the web platform, expanding access for over 2 million users and enhancing the product's cross-platform reach.
Executed over 100 test cases across multiple testing levels, strengthening release reliability and reducing post-launch issues by 35%.
Collaborated with global product teams to align new features with business goals, ensuring relevance across diverse markets.

work_experience.summary: Supported CS courses through labs, grading, and office hours, and built auto-graders in Java and C to streamline evaluation and enhance student learning.
highlights: Built custom auto-grading tools that reduced grading time by 90% and accelerated feedback for over 300 student submissions.
Supported the delivery of 6+ technical courses, assisting 400+ students through labs, office hours, and one-on-one mentoring.
Contributed to improved course satisfaction by providing consistent academic support and clear technical instruction across programming and theory-focused subjects.

projects.title: E-Commerce Product Catalog & Cart (C# & .NET Framework 4.8)
projects.summary: Developed and optimized a dynamic product catalog and shopping cart for a web portal by leveraging Razor views and JavaScript; enabled real-time inventory management and seamless order processing, resulting in improved user experience and increased order accuracy.

projects.title: Mobile Flutter App
projects.summary: Built a cross-platform mobile app using Flutter and Supabase that helps groups select movies via a swipe-based matchmaking system. Implemented secure auth, real-time syncing, and RESTful APIs.

projects.title: Python Chess AI (Variation)
projects.summary: Developed a playable chess variant with AI opponent logic using Minimax and Alpha-Beta pruning, demonstrating strong algorithmic thinking and game logic design.
highlights: Tested AI performance against 105 students' implementations, optimizing heuristics and achieving competitive results.

projects.title: Full Stack Python Online Molecule Viewer
projects.summary: Created a web platform to input, visualize, and analyze 3D molecular structures, integrating front-end interaction with back-end data processing.
highlights: Utilized PostgreSQL, C, Python, JavaScript, AJAX, HTML/CSS, and Bootstrap for seamless front-end and back-end integration.

projects.title: The Impact of Implementing Containerization into CI/CD Testing Pipelines
projects.summary: Authored a research paper analyzing the effects of containerizing CI/CD testing pipelines, evaluating trade-offs of Docker and GitHub Actions integration.

volunteer_experience.organization: Society of Computing and Information Science
highlights: Coordinated internal operations and led student committees to support departmental initiatives and engagement.
Collaborated with the College of Engineering and Physical Sciences Student Council through weekly meetings to advocate for computing students.
Organized bi-weekly events and activities that fostered community, professional development, and peer collaboration.

volunteer_experience.summary: Promoted for leadership and awarded Best New Recruit; participated in field training, flight education, and community service.
highlights: Participated in weekly lessons, monthly field training exercises, and community service activities with a focus on leadership, discipline, and aviation fundamentals.
Promoted to Corporal for consistent leadership and excellence; awarded Best New Recruit during first year.
Represented squadron values through mentorship, teamwork, and active civic involvement.

interests.name: Piano
interests.summary: Completed the Royal Conservatory Program and continue to pursue piano as a lifelong learner.

interests.name: Real Estate
interests.summary: Self-taught in property management and real estate investing since 2018.

interests.name: Culinary Arts
interests.summary: Enjoy experimenting in the kitchen using creativity, teamwork, and adaptability.

interests.name: Automotive Enthusiast
interests.summary: Passionate about automotive mechanics and performance driving, applying problem-solving and composure under pressure.

interests.name: Chess
interests.summary: Former competitive player with strong focus and strategic thinking, developed through nearly a decade of play.
